summary: Comprehensive testing of expanded EdTech platform completed. Backend APIs 90.9% functional, frontend UI 95% functional. All major features working: login, dashboard with stats, 6 DSA tracks, task system, resume builder, placement readiness, analytics track, job trends popup. BRO AI mentor has LLM service issues (520 errors).

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error - 'BRO is taking a coffee break. Try again!'
critical_bugs.impact: BRO AI mentor chat functionality not working

ui_bugs.issue: Popup overlay blocks Profile button clicks due to z-index layering
ui_bugs.workaround: Close popup before navigating or use force=True in automation

integration_issues.issue: Some timeout issues when navigating from DSA tracks to individual tasks

passed_tests: User login with test@gmail.com/test123 (existing user with SDE role, 10 points)
Dashboard loads with all tracks and user stats (Points: 10, Streak: 0, Level: Beginner, Role: SDE, Readiness: 4%)
DSA Tracks page shows all 6 modules (Arrays, Strings, Linked Lists, Stacks/Queues, Trees, DP)
Arrays track navigation and task list display
Resume Builder page with company template selection (Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Infosys)
Placement Readiness Dashboard with skill breakdown and recommendations
Job Trends popup appears after 2 seconds on dashboard
All backend API endpoints except BRO chat (10/11 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix BRO AI mentor chat API - currently returning 520 errors. Check EMERGENT_LLM_KEY configuration and LLM service connectivity. Also consider adjusting Job Trends popup z-index to prevent click interception.
